name: Mobile Network Performance
description: Get an overview of mobile application network performance

rawConfiguration.text:
# Hola! नमस्ते! Hello! やあ! ![New Relic logo](https://newrelic.com/static-assets/images/icons/avatar-newrelic.png)
### This mobile network performance dashboard is designed to be used on both Android and iOS platforms. 
Here are few links which will help you with your mobile instrumentation journey.

- [Introduction to mobile monitoring](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/mobile-monitoring/new-relic-mobile/get-started/introduction-mobile-monitoring/)
- [Introduction to Android monitoring](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/mobile-monitoring/new-relic-mobile-android/get-started/introduction-new-relic-mobile-android/)
- [Introduction to iOS monitoring](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/mobile-monitoring/new-relic-mobile-ios/get-started/introduction-new-relic-mobile-ios/)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) AS 'Users' from MobileSession since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) AS 'Users' from MobileSession since 1 week ago  COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(uuid) AS 'Users' from MobileSession since 30 days ago COMPARE WITH 30 days ago
SELECT uniqueCount(deviceUuid) from Mobile  where osName = 'Android' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT uniqueCount(deviceUuid) from Mobile  where osName = 'iOS' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where osName = 'Android' and networkError not like 'Cancelled'
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where osName = 'iOS' and networkError not like 'Cancelled'
SELECT histogram(sessionDuration, 10, 50) FROM Mobile FACET deviceType
SELECT histogram(sessionDuration, 10, 50) FROM Mobile FACET countryCode

SELECT (1 - filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.sessionId), WHERE errorType = 'HTTPError') / uniqueCount(Mobile.sessionId)) * 100 as '% Error-Free Sessions' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago
SELECT filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType = 'HTTPError') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid) * 100 as '% Users Impacted' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago

SELECT (1 - filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid)) * 100 as '% Failure-Free Users' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago
SELECT filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType = 'NetworkFailure') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid) * 100 as '% Users Impacted' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago
SELECT average(sessionDuration) from Mobile where category = 'Session'  TIMESERIES MAX

SELECT (1-filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.sessionId), WHERE errorType='HTTPError' ) / uniqueCount(Mobile.sessionId)) * 100 as '% Error-Free Sessions' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago

SELECT filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.sessionId), WHERE errorType='HTTPError') / uniqueCount(Mobile.sessionId) * 100 as '% Sessions Impacted' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago

SELECT percentile(responseTime, 98) as '98 percentile (sec)', percentile(responseTime, 90) as '90 percentile (sec)', percentile(responseTime, 50) as '50 percentile (sec)' from MobileRequestError  LIMIT MAX
SELECT filter(count(*), where uuid is not null) as ' ' from MobileRequestError  LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: HTTP Errors:  Percentage of Users Impacted

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType='HTTPError') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid) * 100 as '% Users Impacted' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile  TIMESERIES  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' FACET requestDomain limit MAX
SELECT uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid) / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid) * 100 as '% Users Impacted' from MobileRequestError, Mobile where networkError not like 'Cancelled' timeseries  Limit MAX
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequest FACET requestUrl LIMIT 20
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' facet statusCode TIMESERIES  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError where errorType = 'HTTPError' FACET requestDomain  timeseries max
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' FACET appVersion  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' facet statusCode  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' FACET requestDomain timeseries  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' facet requestPath timeseries  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' facet requestPath LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Network Failures & HTTP Errors: Device Types

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet deviceType LIMIT MAX
SELECT uniqueCount(sessionId) from MobileSession facet appVersion timeseries

SELECT count(*), latest(requestUrl) as 'Latest URL' from MobileRequestError where errorType like 'HTTPError' facet cases(where requestUrl like '%token%' as 'Tokens', where requestUrl like '%summary%' as 'Summary', where requestUrl like '%dashboards%' as 'Dashboards', where requestUrl like '%collections%' as 'Collections', where requestUrl not like '%token%' and requestUrl not like '%summary%' and requestUrl not like '%dashboards%' and requestUrl not like '%collections%' as 'Other' )
FROM MobileRequest, MobileRequestError SELECT percentile(responseTime, 50) as '', percentile(responseTime, 95) as '', percentile(responseTime, 99) as '' FACET appName  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet requestDomain  LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Rsponse Time Distribution by Domain, ASN Owner, Country

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT histogram(responseTime, 20, 20) FROM MobileRequestError facet asnOwner
SELECT percentile(interactionDuration, 95) as percentile95 FROM Mobile FACET lastInteraction, appName  ORDER BY percentile95 DESC TIMESERIES LIMIT 20
select percentile(responseTime / 1000, 95) from MobileRequest where osName='Android' facet requestPath
select percentile(responseTime / 1000, 75) from MobileRequest where osName='Android' facet requestPath
select percentile(responseTime / 1000, 50) from MobileRequest where osName='Android' facet requestPath
select percentile(responseTime / 1000, 95) from MobileRequest where osName='iOS' facet requestPath
select percentile(responseTime / 1000, 75) from MobileRequest where osName='iOS' facet requestPath
select percentile(responseTime / 1000, 50) from MobileRequest where osName='iOS' facet requestPath
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileRequestError WHERE errorType = 'HTTPError' FACET `requestDomain` SINCE 7 days AGO LIMIT Max TIMESERIES

SELECT (filter(uniqueCount(MobileRequestError.uuid), WHERE errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled') / uniqueCount(Mobile.uuid)) * 100 as '% Failure-Free Users' FROM MobileRequestError, Mobile compare with 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' FACET networkErrorCode, networkError  Limit MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet networkError where networkError not like 'Cancelled' timeseries  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet networkError where networkError not like 'Cancelled'  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet requestPath timeseries  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'cancelled' facet appVersion  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet requestDomain timeseries  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet deviceManufacturer LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Network Failures & HTTP Errors: Device Types

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet deviceType LIMIT MAX
SELECT histogram(sessionDuration, 10, 50) FROM MobileRequest FACET requestUrl
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' facet carrier
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'cancelled' facet appName  LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'HTTPError' facet regionCode
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'HTTPError' facet countryCode
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'HTTPError' facet city
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' facet regionCode
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' facet countryCode
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' facet city
SELECT requestMethod, requestUrl, statusCode from MobileRequestError where errorType='HTTPError' LIMIT MAX
SELECT appName,appBuild,countryCode,city,requestUrl,networkErrorCode from MobileRequestError where errorType='NetworkFailure' LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*),latest(device),latest(appName),latest(carrier),latest(asnOwner),latest(regionCode) FROM MobileRequestError where networkError not LiKE 'Cancelled' Facet deviceUuid  limit MAX
SELECT networkError,requestMethod,requestDomain,requestPath from MobileRequestError where errorType = 'NetworkFailure' and networkError not like 'Cancelled' LIMIT MAX

FROM Span SELECT average(duration.ms) / 1000 as 'avg duration', max(duration.ms) / 1000 as 'max duration', count(*), count(error.statusCode) as 'Error count', percentage(count(*), where error.statusCode IS NOT NULL) as 'error (%)' where newRelic.ingestPoint = 'mobile.spans' FACET name limit MAX

SELECT count(*) as 'Total', average(responseTime) as 'Average', percentile(responseTime, 95) as 'AVE 95%', average(bytesReceived) / 1024 as 'Avg KB Received' from MobileRequest facet requestUrl LIMIT MAX
FROM Mobile,MobileRequest SELECT average(responseTime), average(sessionDuration), average(timeSinceLoad) facet countryCode,regionCode,city,connectionType,trace.id,category LIMIT MAX
SELECT count(*) from MobileRequestError facet errorType  LIMIT MAX
FROM MobileRequest,MobileRequestError SELECT percentile(responseTime, 50) as '', percentile(responseTime, 95) as '', percentile(responseTime, 99) as '' FACET appName  LIMIT MAX
FROM MobileRequest, MobileRequestError SELECT percentile(responseTime, 50), percentile(responseTime, 95), percentile(responseTime, 99) FACET appName  TIMESERIES MAX

rawConfiguration.text:
# Hola! नमस्ते! Hello! やあ! ![New Relic logo](https://newrelic.com/static-assets/images/icons/avatar-newrelic.png)
Use this to further **enhance** your dashboard experience

---
### Filtering data for specific entities on Geo Diagnostic page 📊 
This enables you to view the data specific to your entities. You can enable filtering on below widgets:
- HTTP Error: Region wise 
- HTTP Error: Country wise 
- HTTP Error: City wise
- Network Failures: Region wise
- Network Failures: Country wise
- Network Failures: City wise

For applying **Filters** currently you need to provide the dashboard GUID to facet 
link a widget to the this dashboard. 

This can only be accomplished via a two stage apply -
after enabling the dashboard and then updating it with the known GUID. Enable it as follows-> 

Enable `Filter the current dashboard` under `Facet Linking` by editing the widget
